thread.title: Top Colleges in the South for Student Engagement

author: wsjcom
title: Top Colleges in the South for Student Engagement

organizations.name: wall street journal/times higher education college rankings

text:
Texas Christian University tops the list of colleges and universities in the South that are ranked highest for student engagement.
Student engagement, one of four components of the overall Wall Street Journal/Times Higher Education College Rankings, is based primarily on a student survey. It measures views on things such as interactions with faculty and other students, the effectiveness of teaching and whether students would recommend their school.
